data.eml:eml: Macrosiphoniella madeirensis Aguiar & Ilharco sp. nov. (Hemiptera: Sternorrhyncha: Aphididae) from Madeira Island

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Franquinho Aguiar, A. M., Ilharco, Fernando Albano (2005): Macrosiphoniella madeirensis Aguiar & Ilharco sp. nov. (Hemiptera: Sternorrhyncha: Aphididae) from Madeira Island. Zootaxa 867: 1-12, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.170869
